channel.title: Using hamachi
channel.description:
for the people that do not know how to use hamachi here is a guide on how to do it
first go to www.hamachi.com and download for your computer
then logg on to hamachi and their will be a screen to enter your user name and that kind of info...do that
then push join an existing network and type in the network name and then the password such as networkname:test pass:secret
now you will be logged onto the hamachi network
finally to play on the server that you are on, on ur hamachi network you go to moparisthebest.com and then click file : new server then type in the server ip of the hamachi network
now put in your user name and pw and you are playing on hamachi :)[br][size=1]Posted at: December 02, 2006, 08:36:19 PM[/size][hr]if u have any questions ask them here ill be free to help you
